title: riot in think u should give begginers free 5 ip boosts and 5 xpboosts that would be really nice
body: it is very hard to level up because some begginers are noob and we need boost

replies.body: You can actually get some free IP boosts right now! If you're able to attach and verify an email for your account, you'll be able to get some free IP boosts ^_^!
